title: The Segovia Master Class in Spain
creator_credit: Nathan Kroll and National Educational Television
brief_description: Part of the “Library of Master Performers” series. Instructional video featuring one of the world’s finest classical Spanish guitarists, Andres Segovia, as he performs and teaches students at the Santiago de Compostela in Spain. First he works with Aldo Minella (from Italy) on the Concerto in D for guitar, first movement by M. Castelnuovo-Tedesco and then with Luis Rodrigo (from Spain) with the piece Tarantella also by M. Castelnuovo-Tedesco.
